Jekyll Notes

AboutContact MeHikingPrintersWebsite AdviceHomeJekyll

This website is currently being hosted by GitHub as a GitHub Pages site. If you do not know what Git is, it is a technical tool used by programmers. GitHub is a website programmers use to use GitHub.

GitHub Pages uses Jekyll by default. Whenever a Jekyll file is changed, Jekyll is executed to convert the Mardown to a HTML file.
